  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Driver
    This creates a sublass driver from the user class and stores their info including location in the database
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FailedSignUpTest  
    HamburgerFragment
    Purpose: - The weird psuedo nav-drawer I made because I was too dumb to learn how to make the real deal - Shows a menu of the persons name, details, balance, option to open look at details, switch the user type and the log out button - Making the UI kinda cute :) TODO: [x] Update the profile names on change of text from the ProfileActivity [x] onChanged information [x] Can make all button clicks a switch case - maybe that will be less eye jarring
    HomeMapActivity
    This is the 'Home Screen' if the user is a rider.

    User class meant to pull and provide information to the FireBase database about the users involved in the CabMe application
